sentences.cn: 三脚架有助于调准和稳定相机。

sentences.cn: 对齐每个锁闩和差速锁闩眼,使得差速锁闩眼直接地进入锁闩.

sentences.en: Align the ruler and the middle of the paper.
sentences.cn: 使尺子与纸张的中部成一条直线.

sentences.en: As long as the verticals align, the design will look regular.
sentences.cn: 只要所有垂直面在一条线上，图案看起来就会很整齐。

sentences.en: Click on this icon to align or justify text.
sentences.cn: 点击这个图标使文本排齐。

sentences.cn: 保守派一般都深信塔夫脱将与国会中的保守议员紧密合作.

sentences.en: Directs and supervises production process to align with SOP.
sentences.cn: 严格按照SOP要求指导和规范生产工艺流程.

sentences.en: How can I align these bricks with the rest of the wall?
sentences.cn: 我怎么才能将这些砖与其余的墙对齐(排成直线)?

sentences.cn: 我想下礼拜我应该还是去做个复健还是什么的.

sentences.en: It also prompted other princes to align quietly against them.
sentences.cn: 但是也会使得其他亲王暗地里反对他们.

sentences.cn: 扳开细杆并对准蓝线,或者取出介质.

sentences.cn: 确保所有的洞眼成一条直线。

sentences.cn: 书桌一行行排得整整齐齐。

sentences.en: The interferometer is relatively difficult to align.
sentences.cn: 这种干涉仪比较难调整.

sentences.en: To align ( a gun, for example ) with a target.
sentences.cn: 瞄准:把 ( 枪枝 ) 的准星与目标对齐.

sentences.en: When war broke out, they aligned themselves with the rebel forces.
sentences.cn: 战争爆发以后，他们与叛军结了盟。

sentences.en: While water skiing, you should try to align the skis.
sentences.cn: 滑水的时候应尽量保持滑水板不偏斜.

sentences.en: You have align the bricks with the rest of the wall.
sentences.cn: 你得把砖码得和剩下的那段墙成一行.

trans.tran_en: to arrange things so that they form a line or are parallel to each other, or to be in a position that forms a line etc
